thread.section_title: Hotel Therese - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of Hotel Therese, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Victoria B
title: Excellent hotel
text:
We stayed at the Hotel Therese for four nights and were really impressed with everything about it.
The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful - they recommended restaurants and helped with our reservations (particularly valuable as our French is pretty poor!). The decor of the communal areas was beautiful and the inclusive breakfast was excellent. The hotel is located around many Japanese restaurants but is only a short walk to find French or Italian options. We couldn't fault the location in terms of its vicinity to Parisian attractions.
The only slight disappointment was the room service, where the menu was limited.
We would strongly recommend this hotel to others.
